title: Ranked ban
body: hello i got banned from ranked matches and chat without even playing... i just logged in and the game said i got chat restricted for 75 games and a 35 draft-win-game ban... i know i flame quite often but the alst time i flamed was over 2 weeks ago and i was quite unhappy... i know i cant win the 35 draft matches in 28 days so i will lose lp without having done anything wrong... please someone help me i feel so bad because its the first time i feel like being treated wrong

replies.body:
wait... you admit that you flamed... but then you claimed to have done nothing wrong? Breaking News: Flaming is wrong. No matter the situation... It doesnt help you win games, it only gets your teammates  to tilt (even harder) and it gets you banned from Ranked... nothing to gain by doing it, so stop it...

And Ranked Restrictions aren't exactly a new invention... they exsist since last year... yet you still flamed 2 Week ago... your not "treated wrong", you acted wrong and now you've got to live with it...

But think positive: The fact that this restriction actually costs you... might actually stop you from flaming. Just dont do it anymore and you wont have any problems...

Oh... und Sauerkraut und Bratwurst...

Heya
As you said, you flame. So there is the reason you got the restriction. Just because you did not play doesnt mean, that you dont get a restriction.  You should consider to stop flaming, if you dont want another restriction.
Also this is the german forum.

Rkoturdo
